kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent: 1. Are any of your projects using [one of our open-source integrations](https://community.kentico.com/resource-hub/integrations)? Not all of them support deploying the admin separately. 1. Your application builds correctly when you run `dotnet build -p:AdminAttached=false`? 1. You can use [`dotnet nuget why`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-nuget-why) to find all the packages referencing `kentico.xperience.admin`
